Save Changes? (Close All) Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select File»Close All to display the Save changes? (Close All) dialog box.

Use this dialog box to save all components of a VI before closing. Click List unsaved changes to launch the Explain Changes dialog box.

  • Save—Save all current VIs.
  • Don't Save—Removes all VIs and their associated components from memory without saving.
  • Cancel—Cancel the close operation.

Enable the Apply same action to remaining x affected items checkbox to save or discard all items listed in the Affected Items listbox.
